transcript: if you're 18 years old in two days you could go and become certified as a phlebotomist and go from making 750 or whatever the minimum wage is to what phlebotomists make at 25 an hour you would triple your earning capacity after two days and spending 500 do you think it's worth the investment probably there's the value of the problem that you solve and what you charge for it the bigger that number is the more you can charge that gap between their old problem and the solution is the percentage that you can take and put in your pocket as something that you have now created in this and it could be a service it could be products it could be whatever your earning capacity is going to be the thing that generates you wealth
